creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: hexagonal shape; cross stitched on front with geometric design inside an octagon surrounded by more random border; predominately red, yellow and black; short woven orange and black strap; tassels on edges of various colors with beads; two larger tassels have metal ornaments and beads; purple velvet backing
medium: Cotton, velvet, glass and metal beads, metal
title: Pouch
